summary: This script unloads the root filesystem, creates a new directory for it, sets appropriate permissions, and mounts the existing root filesystem onto the newly created directory.

details.comment: This script unloads the root filesystem, creates a new directory for it, sets appropriate permissions, and mounts the existing root filesystem onto the newly created directory.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
./unloadroot.sh
sudo mkdir root
sudo chmod 777 root
sudo mount --bind -r / root/
